Ngugi wa Thiong'o shifted to writing in his native Gikuyu language.   During his imprisonment without trial in 1977, Ngugi wrote 'Devil on the Cross' on toilet paper, which was his first novel in the Gikuyu language.
Yolande Mukagasana's notable autobiographical works include:  La Mort ne veut pas de moi (Death Does Not Want Me, 1997)  N'aie pas peur de savoir (Don't Be Afraid to Know, 1999)
